# Maharashtra State Film Award for Best Documentary

| former name =
| holder_label = Most recent winner

The Maharashtra State Film Award for Best Documentary is a jury award presented annually at the Maharashtra State Film Awards. They are announced by the Minister for Cultural Affairs and are presented by the Chief Minister. The award was first presented in 1984.
